title: Interview -
sub_title: Field research to learn more about the pain points of the target audience
method: Via the main stakeholder several contacts were made with the different target audience groups. For my research question I interviewed 3 members of the adminstrative team at a Curio school.
research: Research question 1B: What does the end-to-end user experience    of the teachers and administrative staff look like and what are the pain points?
findings: This was one of the most crucial pieces of research commited thus far. Many pain points came forth from the interview, narrowing the scope, and creating a better goal for the final product.
conclusion: The goal of this interview was to hear from the target audience and what their issues were with PARS. To achieve this 3 different adminstrative personnel were interviewed. From these interviews it became clear that there were quite a few issues with PARS, it however was by no means an unstable, or unusable product. The findings proved to be an essential part in the continuation of the projectr.

sources.title: CMD Methods Pack - find a combination of research methods that suit your needs. (n.d.).
